languages.text: "Как ты можешь доверять своим прозрениям, Идира? Неужели не боишься, что историю будущего тебе нашептывает Архивраг?"
"The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"
languages.original_text: "Как ты можешь доверять своим прозрениям, Идира? Неужели не боишься, что историю будущего тебе нашептывает Архивраг?"

traits.locale_text: "How can you trust your visions, Idira? Aren't you afraid that the future you see is but the whispers of the Archenemy?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How can you trust your visions, Idira? Aren't you afraid that the future you see is but the whispers of the Archenemy?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How can you trust your visions, Idira? Aren't you afraid that the future you see is but the whispers of the Archenemy?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How can you trust your visions, Idira? Aren't you afraid that the future you see is but the whispers of the Archenemy?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你看到的所谓‘未来’，说不定只是混沌大敌的低语！你怎么能相信你的幻觉，伊迪拉？”
languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: “你看到的所谓‘未来’，说不定只是混沌大敌的低语！你怎么能相信你的幻觉，伊迪拉？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡El futuro que ve podría no ser más que los susurros del Archienemigo! ¿Cómo puede confiar en sus visiones, Idira?».
languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: «¡El futuro que ve podría no ser más que los susurros del Archienemigo! ¿Cómo puede confiar en sus visiones, Idira?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの見る未来は、渾沌の勢力の囁きに過ぎない！イディラ、どうやってあなたのビジョンを信じろというのだ？」
languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの見る未来は、渾沌の勢力の囁きに過ぎない！イディラ、どうやってあなたのビジョンを信じろというのだ？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Zukunft, die Ihr seht, könnte das Flüstern des Erzfeindes sein! Wie könnt Ihr Euren Visionen vertrauen, Idira?"
languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr Euren Visionen vertrauen, Idira? Habt Ihr keine Angst, die Zukunft, die Ihr seht, könnte nichts als die Einflüsterung des Erzfeindes sein?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « L'avenir que vous voyez pourrait très bien vous être soufflé par le Grand Ennemi ! Comment pouvez-vous vous fier à vos visions, Idira ? »
languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: « L'avenir que vous voyez pourrait très bien vous être soufflé par le Grand Ennemi ! Comment pouvez-vous vous fier à vos visions, Idira ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

languages.text: "Gelecek diye gördüklerin aslında Şerbaşı'nın fısıltıları olabilir! Görülerine nasıl güvenebiliyorsun İdira?"
languages.original_text: "The future you see could be the whispers of the Archenemy! How can you trust your visions, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: "Gelecek diye gördüklerin aslında Şerbaşı'nın fısıltıları olabilir! Görülerine nasıl güvenebiliyorsun İdira?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
